Eligibility: Postmenopausal status defined as history of at least 12 months without spontaneous menstrual bleeding or a documented hysterectomy and bilateral salpingo oophorectomy
No hormone replacement therapy for at least six months prior to entry into this study
History of stroke, pulmonary embolism or deep vein thrombosis
Presence of any known hypercoagulable state either congenital (e.g., protein S deficiency) or acquired (e.g., corticosteroid treatment)
Presence of a psychiatric condition that would interfere with adherence to the protocol.
Results: Change of absolute breast density as indicated by mammography from baseline to Year +1 and completion of study (Year +2). No other mammograms will be obtained or used for the purpose of this study. Absolute breast density volume is based on breast thickness and the x-ray attenuation at each pixel of the image.
Unit of Measure: cm squared  Absolute density at baseline: 53 participants
Arm/Group Description: Raloxifene 60 mg Orally Daily
Unit of Measure: cm squared  Absolute density at baseline: 53 participants
